TopicTitle: Simple Request to Mod Makers using CKAN

Articles.Content:
When creating an update for a mod that is incompatible with older versions of KSP for whatever reason, it would be a good practice to republish the new mod to CKAN with a correct min version number instead of just increasing the max version number. Several mods became incompatible with 1.2 for example when they were updated to work with 1.3, but the min version said they were compatible back to 0.5 or whatever. The result is many users download the mod to get new parts or features and end up not only breaking their existing mod install, but their save files as well.

Just a thought.
